verses.roman:
bhikṣā kari' mahāprabhu tāṅre praśna kaila
''kaha vipra, ei tomāra kon daśā haila

synonyms: bhikṣā kari'-after accepting lunch; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; praśna kaila—asked a question; kaha vipra—My dear brāhmaṇa friend, please say; ei—this; tomāra—your; kon—what; daśā—situation; haila—became.
translation: After finishing His lunch there, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu asked the brāhmaṇa, "My dear friend, kindly tell Me what your position is now.
